EmailTemplate.name: VMUG Atlanta follow up.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: VMUG Atlanta Follow Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thanks for taking the time to come by and see us at the VMware User Group in Atlanta. As a follow-up to the event, I've linked below a few of the many resources designed to dive deeper into the ways VMTurbo will dramatically improve how you control and automate your virtual data center.
- Trial Download <http://bit.ly/QzvQgM> - check out VMTurbo in your environment, absolutely free - Online Evaluation Resource Center <http://bit.ly/Yz66Yv> for product and support info - Whitepaper <http://bit.ly/1estnDV> on reducing compute costs in VMware vCloud Director Environments
My team will be following up with you shortly to understand your priorities and interest in learning more about VMTurbo.
Kind regards Steve Corndell
